pullRequest.body:
All of them are related to backwards compatibility flags.

Found by `adomani`'s linter in #13653, not exhaustive.


---

(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go

nodes.body:
### PR summary

#### Import changes

No significant changes to the import graph

---

#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! üêô
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
</details>

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/5a35d299-3d22-42aa-979f-0a36767e90ba) for commit 687cac26bdbfcd186a9877eae024dd5d05551769.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/74b468b2-87fc-430b-9e1b-1f50a9d9730d/to/5a35d299-3d22-42aa-979f-0a36767e90ba) against commit ed63385753ed24f23d780e567364a1e001f6ee91.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9438077224/job/25994675309)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9438077224/job/25994675338)

After this PR, there are 23 remaining references. A few of those are flagged by the linter - perhaps they could be removed also. (Would you prefer exhaustively removing these as flagged by the linter?)
Update: with most occurrences of the linter addressed, there are 9 remaining references to this issue. I don't think *all* of them can be removed, but this PR shows quite a few can.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: remove some `set_option ... in` which are not necessary any more
